GSP30pratyabu:600: sat avibhāgavedanātmakabindurūpatayā sphuritaṃ anuttara eva viśrāmyati /
GSP30pratyabu:601: iti śabdarāśisvarūpa eva ayaṃ akṛtako vimarśaḥ /
GSP30pratyabu:604: svātantryam atha kartṛtvaṃ mukhyam īśvaratāpi ca [34] / iti /
GSP30pratyabu:605: eṣaiva ca ahantā sarvamantrāṇāṃ udayaviśrāntisthānatvāt etadbalenaiva c= a
GSP30pratyabu:616: prathate adhyavasīyate smaryate saṃkalpyate vā tatra sarvatraiva bhagavatī
GSP30pratyabu:619: asphuraṇāt ” iti uktatvāt kevalaṃ tathā sphuranty api sā tanmāyāśaktyā
GSP30pratyabu:622: vastutas tu ekaiva asau citiśaktiḥ / yathoktam
GSP30pratyabu:627: evam eṣā sarvadaśāsu ekaiva citiśaktiḥ vijṛmbhamāṇā yadi
GSP30pratyabu:634: yadā tv ekatra saṃrūḍhas tadā tasya layodbhavau /
GSP30pratyabu:635: niyacchan bhoktṛtām eti tataś cakreśvaro bhavet [39] // iti /
GSP30pratyabu:636: atra ekatra iti “ekatrāropayet sarvaṃ” [40] iti citsāmānyaspandabhūḥ
GSP30pratyabu:640: puryaṣṭakam eva parāmraṣṭavyam na tu yathā vivaraṇakṛtaḥ ekatra
GSP30pratyabu:641: sūkṣme sthūle śarīre vā iti vyākṛtavantaḥ /
GSP30pratyabu:647: śivaṃ śivaprāptihetutvāt śivāt prasṛtatvāt śivasvarūpābhinnatvāc ca
GSP30pratyabu:650: pūrṇānandaghanām imāṃ na cinute māheśvarīṃ svāṃ citim /
GSP30pratyabu:652: yaḥ paśyed upadeśatas tu kathitaḥ sākṣāt sa ekaḥ śivaḥ //
